Package com.flipkart.business

Interface CustomerServiceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerService
    public interface CustomerServiceInterface
    This interface defines the service operations related to customer functionality. It includes methods for retrieving gym center details by city, available slots, customer bookings, booking slots, canceling bookings, registering customers, viewing customer profiles, validating user credentials, and getting customer plans.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Books a slot for a customer on a specific date and slot ID at a given gym center.

      Cancels a booking based on the provided booking ID.

      Retrieves details of all gym centers in a specific city.
      java.util.List<Slot> getAvailableSlots​(java.lang.String centreID, java.sql.Date date)
      Retrieves available slots for a specific gym center and date.
      java.util.List<Booking> getCustomerBookings​(java.lang.String customerId)
      Retrieves bookings made by a specific customer.
      java.util.List<UserPlan> getCustomerPlan​(java.lang.String userName)
      Retrieves a list of user plans associated with a specific customer ID.

      Validates the user's credentials (username and password).

      Registers a new customer with the provided details.
      Customer viewMyProfile​(java.lang.String userName)
      Retrieves the profile details of a specific customer.

      • bookSlot

        boolean bookSlot​(java.lang.String userID,
                 java.sql.Date date,
                 java.lang.String slotId,
                 java.lang.String centreId)
        Books a slot for a customer on a specific date and slot ID at a given gym center.
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the user making the booking
        date - The date for the booking
        slotId - The ID of the slot for the booking
        centreId - The ID of the gym center for the booking
        Returns:
        True if the booking is successful, false otherwise

      • cancelBookingbyID

        void cancelBookingbyID​(java.lang.String bookingID)
        Cancels a booking based on the provided booking ID.
        Parameters:
        bookingID - The ID of the booking to be canceled

      • registerCustomer

        void registerCustomer​(java.lang.String userName,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                      java.lang.String cardNumber)
        Registers a new customer with the provided details.
        Parameters:
        userName - The username chosen by the customer
        password - The password chosen by the customer
        email - The email address of the customer
        phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer
        cardNumber - The card number associated with the customer
